title: Blamish snail slime

properties.name: description
properties.value: Blamish snail slime is a quest item in Heroes' Quest. When added to a vial of water with Harralander it makes blamish oil, which can be used on a fishing rod to make an oily fishing rod. The oily fishing rod can then be used to catch lava eels in the Taverley Dungeon or the Lava Maze, or infernal eels in Mor Ul Rek.

Blamish snail slime is a quest item in Heroes' Quest. When added to a vial of water with Harralander it makes blamish oil, which can be used on a fishing rod to make an oily fishing rod. The oily fishing rod can then be used to catch lava eels in the Taverley Dungeon or the Lava Maze, or infernal eels in Mor Ul Rek.

Blamish snail slime can be made by going to Mort Myre Swamp, killing a Myre blamish snail, and mashing the thin snail with a pestle and mortar with an empty sample bottle in the player's inventory. Sample bottles can be obtained from the general store in Canifis.

Gerrant provides players with one blamish snail slime for free during Heroes' Quest.

[[File:Blamish snail slime detail.png|left|100px]]
'''Blamish snail slime''' is a [[quest item]] in [[Heroes' Quest]]. When added to a [[vial of water]] with [[Harralander]] it makes [[blamish oil]], which can be used on a [[fishing rod]] to make an [[oily fishing rod]]. The oily fishing rod can then be used to catch [[lava eel]]s in the [[Taverley Dungeon]] or the [[Lava Maze]], or [[infernal eel]]s in [[Mor Ul Rek]].

Blamish snail slime can be made by going to [[Mort Myre Swamp]], killing a [[Myre blamish snail]], and mashing the [[thin snail]] with a [[pestle and mortar]] with an empty [[sample bottle]] in the player's inventory. Sample bottles can be obtained from the [[general store]] in [[Canifis]].

[[Gerrant]] provides players with one blamish snail slime for free during Heroes' Quest.
